duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform detailed Thermal analysis to support all phases of programs including development and production.
Define the scope and level of analysis required to meet objectives and be held accountable for completing the work within the agreed upon cost and schedule.
Present work for peer reviews and be a peer reviewer for other engineers’ work.
Collaborate with internal and external customers to define testing required to validate Thermal analyses and ensure hardware compliance with requirements.
Plan and support tests, perform data reduction, and engage in Thermal model correlation.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Science, Technology, Engineering or Mathematics (STEM) with 10 years of experience. Advanced degree in a related field may be substituted for additional years of experience.
